amendment.description: Amendment to ensure that voluntary agricultural practices can be included to meet the goals and ambitions of the Paris Agreement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in House Report 116-42 to ensure that voluntary agricultural practices can be included to meet the goals and ambitions of the Paris Agreement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrier amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 295 - 132 (Roll no. 180).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrier amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 295 - 132 (Roll no. 180).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Ms. Schrier.
